display_name: 111 Where would you place yourself on this ladder?
description:
Think of this ladder as representing where people stand in the United States.
At the top of the ladder are the people who are the best off – those who have the most money, the most education, and the most respectable jobs. The bottom are the people who are the worst off
– those who have the least money, least education, and the least respected jobs or no job
